lines.text: [first lines]
Fuck you.
I heard that 350 white folks committed suicide by jumping off the Golden Gate Bridge. And out of the 350, there was two that was niggers.
And one of them was pushed.
[laughs]
This here's where Simple Savior runs his black revolution, brother. Natural black Jesus is the reverend's cousin, too. He gives people the strength to kill whites.
Kill whites?
[to Preacher Fox]
You hear that shit?
[to Doorman]
Any whites?
Yeah, any whites.
Ain't this a bitch?
Anyone we want?
Ain't this a bitch!
Huh. We can kill anyone we want?
Any whites.
I have one special...

[Grabs Fox and pulls him to the side]
Stop it, Fox. Stop it.
I'm tired of trying to segregate, integrate, and masturbate anymore!
Shut your stupid mouth!

[effeminate voice]
Don't you dare strike me, or I'll tell poppa!
Don't start it! If I told poppa what you were doing, he'd break both your arms and legs!

[effeminate]
So, what's wrong with me taking a little kick-back once in a while on my own?
[speaks Italian]
Money, stupid! We take money, NOT BLOW JOBS!
You do?
The Mafia takes MONEY! Remember us? We're the Mafia!
Nobody move. We are in a lot of trouble.

[narration]
It was a tar rabbit, baby!
[waiting for Sampson and the Preacherman; getting impatient]
Damn, they ain't showed yet. I'm going to have to get out of here on my own.
Sit down, boy. Don't you leave this wall. They'll pick your ass up, sure as shit! And I ain't never seen nobody that they picked up come back walking, talking, laughing, or breathing!
Those queer sons of a bitches!

[Talking to a gravestone]
Ben, now don't you go believin' that I'm shaky! I still got it Ben! I don't lie to you, or God. I still take care of Rabbit and Bear you know!
[picks up gravestone and begins to carry it with him]
An' I don't want you or Mama to worry none 'cause ol' Fox here he doesn't gonna...

[annoyed]
Stop it, Fox, stop it!
I'm gonna be puttin' you back now, Ben!
[replaces gravestone]
Don't you worry 'bout a thing!
I got the devil in me, but it's the man you see.
Preacher, why don't you shut up?
'Cause I have an electric mouth!
